Review.Titre: It's great product and I very loved it.

Review.Contenu: Website easy to use, payment easy but delay in communication with clearance of PayPal payment, so could be a bit faster as one always wonders if electronic payments are successful....Products are great, however....!!

Review.Titre: My order was placed on back order…
Review.Contenu: My order was placed on back order otherwise price of my Zujirushi rice cooker was the lowest on the market by $20 less. My order was placed during Black Friday weekend I understand the reason for the delay and made my stove top in the meantime but it was annoying to change my meal prep cooking schedule a week later then when I had anticipated the cooker.

Review.Titre: Very prompt in taking and mailing my…
Review.Contenu: Very prompt in taking and mailing my online order but needed help to accept my credit card payment other than using PayPal.

Review.Titre: Item was delivered in good condition
Review.Contenu: Item was delivered in good condition.  Fast shipping.  Overall a good shopping experience.
Easy ordering and good delivery.  Will buy again from this store.
Good price, fast shipping and great product. Very satisfied overall.

At first I was skeptical, having never heard of Superco. And their prices were much less than I had ever seen before for this product. But….Superco delivered as promised. And they promptly answered the phone and called me back as promised. Would totally turn to Superco again! Thanks!

Review.Titre: The best price I could find on the…
Review.Contenu: The best price I could find on the Internet and shipping was very fast product came in amazing condition. I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Easy to order on line and delivery was…
Review.Contenu: Easy to order on line and delivery was timely.
Product came as advertised and arrived earlier than expected. Was cheapest I could find online. I’d happily do business with them again.

Good rice cookers are expensive. Superco had the exact model I was looking for and cost $65 less than that "Prime" place and had free shipping. I was skeptic at first but decided to buy after reading the reviews of Superco. I'm glad I did. Our new Zojirushi Induction cooker is legit and actually makes rice taste better! Shipping was fast and packaged well. Communication was also excellent. Received lots of updates to where they were in the process.
Was easy to order, Great price, Plenty of selection and unbelievable fast on time DELIVERY
Mike’s enthusiasm and Bible knowledge, and finally his realWorld examples in the church are inspiring and powerful.

Review.Titre: They're not just legit, they're great!
Review.Contenu: Frankly I was initially a little bit worried about the company because of the name and the discount prices. However I did some research including looking them up on Trust Pilot and decided to give them a try The website said the item we were interested in was out of stock. I used the chat feature and found out they were expecting a shipment soon and that we could go ahead and order it to be on the backordered list.We went ahead and ordered the item and it actually shipped a day earlier than they said so it arrived early.I'm sure we'll be ordering from them again.

Really happy with my experience.I've never been to Superco's brick and mortar store but took a chance and ordered a Zojirushi water boiler online. It came delivered to San Francisco in perfect condition. Good packaging that wasn't wasteful. Timely shipping. It was also a really good deal, the price was cheaper than anywhere else I could find. Couldn't fault Superco and would order from them again.

Review.Titre: authentic product with way better price
Review.Contenu: I was a bit skeptical in the very beginning since I never heard about the website and also their price is surprisingly lower than the fair market price.It turned out that I worried too much. Authentic products, really nice customer service and super fast shipping! Love it.Now I know where to check for my next purchase, especially with home appliance!

Review.Titre: Beats all the on-line retailers on value
Review.Contenu: Competitive pricing that beat all the others I normally buy from. The ease of the transaction was matched by the fast and free delivery.

Superco was incredibly responsive and helpful throughout the entire process. Not to mention, they had the best deal on the Zojirushi water boiler and free shipping. Why would you not go with them? Shipping took about a couple of days (but only because they were waiting for stock to come in), but from shipment to delivery was less than 5 business days to TX. Take a look at Superco, tbh I've never heard of them before this but I'm glad I took a chance on them.

These guys are super responsive. I recently bought a pricey rice cooker from them, only to discover the same item significantly cheaper on Amazon. I emailed them and within one business day, they had processed a refund on the price difference. I'll definitely consider them for appliances in the future.

Each staff member, who worked with me on my order, was very responsive to my questions and concerns. I felt very well cared for. Once I knew which appliance and model were my first choice I also knew I would be completely satisfied with my purchase and it's operation in my kitchen. Your delivery service was also excellent and easy to track my package. Thank you, I will order from you in the future and I will recommend you to my friends.

Review.Titre: Zojirushi 5.5 rice cooker with neuro fuzzy.
Review.Contenu: My order was delivered faster than Amazon and I saved a lot more with Superco...yay!The Zojirushi rice cooker was delivered with an outer box to protect it with no dents or damage upon arrival.The item was new in the box and as described.I could not be happier with this purchase and the whole order,delivery process.I recommend this company emphatically!

Review.Titre: Our rice cooker was an easy purchase…
Review.Contenu: Our rice cooker was an easy purchase online with unexpectedly quick free shipping. I live in New England and the rice cooker arrived from California in 7 days. I ordered it on a Friday night, the order was processed and shipped on Monday and I had it delivered to me with no issues on Friday afternoon.

Review.Titre: Zojirushi Neuro Fuzzy Rice Cooker Online
Review.Contenu: I’ve been waiting for a sale on zojirushi neuro fuzzy rice cooker for a while when I saw superco’s deal online. I’m not based in CA, so I’m not familiar with the store. I decided to purchase through them anyway since the price was nearly 20% cheaper than all other vendors. The rice cooker was shipped the same day I placed the order and I received it in 3 days. The order processing and shipping speed was phenomenal. I’ve used the rice cooker three times now and am very happy with the rice quality! It’s a very significant improvement over my instant pot pressure cooker. Would absolutely buy from them again!

Ken was very helpful , returns my phones calls and answered all the questions I asked, he sent my Oder out just after several hours I placed my order.The Tatung rice cooker came in perfect condition， and the price is great.Thank you for your excellent service.

Superco sales high many quality products with low prices that beat other stores. The website design is attractive, easy to search for a product with detailed descriptions. It offers free shipping and on time delivery.

The 1st Zojirushi rice cooker wasn’t working properly. Superco responded promptly of my issue and offered me refund or replacement. I loved the way The Rice came out so I asked for a replacement. The new Zo seems to work good so far. Thanks Superco!  Will definitely order through Superco in the future.

Review.Titre: Great price and super fast delivery
Review.Contenu: The rice cooker I ordered came so quickly it felt like it was the next day. It was packaged well and the price was unbeatable.

I appreciate the smooth processing of our online order, fulfilling it, along with all the email updates about tracking/order status. Thanks for a great experience and quick shipping.  I’ll be ordering again.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: I ordered a Zojirushi rice cooker and…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Zojirushi rice cooker and could not be happier with my shopping experience.  I immediately received my invoice and the staff sent me emails letting me know the status of the shipment.  I live in Illinois and was very impressed with how fast I received the rice cooker!  The best shopping experience online I have had in a long time!  Great job and I will be back in the future for sure!!  Oh and I love the rice cooker!

Review.Titre: Best price fast shipping sent note for…
Review.Contenu: Best price fast shipping sent note for just two days delayed gave option to cancel and my rice cooker came exactly on time I'm very happy with the company.

Super fast order processing time and I was surprised to get the product with a next day delivery. I am so in love with my new “made in Japan” Zojirushi water boiler. The price is the cheapest I can find online too.

Review.Titre: Very reliable store with competitive price
Review.Contenu: Very reliable service and products.  Initially I am a bit hesitant to order from Superco since I am not familiar with this store and they offer lower price comparing to other well known stores.  I received my high end model of Zojirushi rice cooker NP-NWC10 and I am so happy with my purchase, then I make another purchase for friend and family which all are very satisfied with the products and delivery.  I will definitely revisit the store if I have anything to shop in future.

Ordering was easy, pricing was competitive (better than Amazon), free shipping for what I ordered, and product was shipped timely. Packaging was sufficient to protect the product during shipping. Order was made on Sunday and product was received by Wednesday.

Review.Titre: Product got to me on a very timely…
Review.Contenu: Product got to me on a very timely manner! It came undamaged. I love the rice cooker it’s the Escalades of rice cookers!

Review.Titre: The order process and receiving of the…
Review.Contenu: The order process and receiving of the rice cooker are very good.Just wondering why the bottom has left unmovable dirty marks after the very first time rice cooked.I would like to know how to get rid of the marks, water and soap didn’t work. Thank you!

This is my first time shopping with Superco. Never heard about them before. I had my doubts but the reviews made me jump on it. Got best rice cooker at the best price. Fast shipping and delivery. Absolutely recommend!!

Review.Titre: I never heard of this place before and…
Review.Contenu: I never heard of this place before and as I was searching for a Zozirushi rice cooker and seems only this place was carrying. So I called them to make sure the web site is legit. Some one answered and mentioned the stock is limited. I placed the order and the item arrived brand new double packed. Don't hesitate to order from them and they are genuine people. But I don't know whats their return policies though i case you run into issues with the item

Review.Titre: Nice to know some companies have a high level of service
Review.Contenu: As a confirmed shopaholic, I appreciate knowing that the item was in stock before adding it to my shopping car and the prompt shipping. I hate how some companies aren't upfront about their inventory and their weak ability to get the product onto a delivery truck in a timely manner.
They have the best price! The shipping was free and fast for small electronics. The product is exactly as described on their website—one of the best online shopping experiences.

Review.Titre: The price with the quality of the Quality can be placed
Review.Contenu: The price with the quality of the product that exceeds the price I've been looking for a place like this for a long time. Initially, I was not confident with online products, but here, it surprised me. and i will use the service again.

Review.Titre: I have bought the appliance from…
Review.Contenu: I have bought the appliance from Superco for more than 30 years. The products and services they carried are superior and no comparison to any main stores. Will shopping there for another 30 + years.

I’m very happy that Superco acknowledged my need to return a product. Superco communicated the process well and did not charge me extra for the return because I had communicated with them on the topic prior to the shipment of the product. I will definitely recommend Superco to my friends and family who would like to purchase Asian household items and electronics.

This is my third time I ordered the Joyoung soymilk maker from Superco.  I am very satisfied with both the delivery and price. I did recommend Superco to my friends. Two have already placed an order of the soy milk machine from Superco.

Superco is a terrific store to buy appliances. They had exactly what I needed. And the service was excellent. I look forward to buying my next major appliance and small appliances from them again.
